name: 5 Card Slingo
summary: Are you ready to play 12 hands of poker at once!? 5 Card Slingo is the exciting game that combines the fast paced fun of Slingo with strategic poker playing action. It features 3 modes of game play, including the brand new Mixed Matrix, which lets you put the cards anywhere! It also saves your best hand in each mode, keeps track of your top scores and has a top ten list to highlight all of the big winners. Do you have what it takes to be one of them? Play 5 Card Slingo today and get lucky!
